actions.text: Amendment SA 261 ruled out of order by the chair.
Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 261 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 53 - 46. Record Vote Number: 59.
Point of order 261 raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 261.

Amendment SA 261 proposed by Senator Blunt. (consideration: CR S2270-2271; text: CR S2270-2271) To create a point of order against legislation that would create a Federal tax or fee on carbon emissions.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 261 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 53 - 46. Record Vote Number: 59.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 261 proposed by Senator Blunt.

purpose: To create a point of order against legislation that would create a Federal tax or fee on carbon emissions.
